GapFillDragDrop.Title: Phrasal verbs
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Drag the correct word from the word pool to fill each gap.

Content.Question:
1. Fay is going to carry on with her psychology course next year, but she’ll drop her ecology course.
2. Stella asked her assistant to take down the details of their new materials supplier.
3. Belle always cries if her parents come to see her off at the airport when she returns to her husband
in Canada.
4. Charlotte worked in a café at weekends to save up for the college skiing trip. She didn’t want to miss out on a wonderful holiday!
5. At the end of the day, everyone was bored and started to mess around in the history lecture.
6. Frances had to fill in a lengthy application form for the university she wanted to study at.
7. Sadie was driving fast because we were late for work, but I told her to slow down to avoid an accident.
8. Could you hand out these questionnaires to the students please?
9. Freddie forgot to lock up our garage before we went on holiday. Luckily nothing was stolen.
10. Marta is the type of person who will speak out against something she doesn’t believe in.
